001package org.nasdanika.ncore.util;
002
003import java.util.Optional;
004
005import org.eclipse.emf.common.notify.Notifier;
006import org.eclipse.emf.common.util.TreeIterator;
007import org.eclipse.emf.common.util.URI;
008import org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EObject;
009import org.eclipse.emf.ecore.resource.impl.ResourceSetImpl;
010
011public class NcoreResourceSet extends ResourceSetImpl {
012
013        @Override
014        public EObject getEObject(URI uri, boolean loadOnDemand) {              
015                TreeIterator<Notifier> cit = getAllContents();
016                while (cit.hasNext()) {
017                        Notifier next = cit.next();
018                        if (next instanceof EObjectLocator) {
019                                cit.prune();
020                                Optional<EObject> ret = ((EObjectLocator) next).get(uri);
021                                if (ret != null) {
022                                        return ret.orElse(null);
023                                }
024                        }
025                        if (next instanceof EObject) {
026                                EObject nextEObject = (EObject) next;
027                                if (matchURI(nextEObject, uri)) {
028                                        return nextEObject;
029                                }
030                        }
031                }
032                
033                return super.getEObject(uri, loadOnDemand);
034        }
035        
036        /**
037         * Matches {@link EObject} to {@link URI}. This implementation uses ModelElement.getUri() to 
038         * match containment path URI's and ModelElement.getUuid() to match URI's with <code>uuid</code> scheme.  
039         * uses  
040         * @param eObj
041         * @param uri
042         * @return
043         */
044        protected boolean matchURI(EObject eObj, URI uri) {
045                if (NcoreUtil.isEMapEntry(eObj)) {
046                        return false; // Ignoring EMap entries.
047                }
048                for (URI objUri: NcoreUtil.getIdentifiers(eObj)) {
049                        if (objUri != null && objUri.equals(uri)) {
050                                return true;
051                        }
052                }
053                return false;
054        }
055
056}
